title: Grilled lamb chops with Meyer lemon risotto and arugula...and a GIVEAWAY, courtesy of McCormick
summary: Grilled lamb chops with Meyer lemon risotto and arugula...and a GIVEAWAY, courtesy of McCormick might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe makes 6 servings with 1603 calories, 148g of protein, and 50g of fat each. For $10.06 per serving, this recipe covers 84% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Not a lot of people really liked this Mediterranean dish. If you have grilled lamb chops, honey, meyer lemon risotto, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the ginger you could follow this main course with the Ginger Cake with Crystallized Ginger Frosting as a dessert. 5 people found this recipe to be tasty and satisfying. The Fourth Of July will be even more special with this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and dairy free diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 94%. This score is super. Try Baked Risotto With Meyer Lemon, Chicken & Arugula, Broiled Lamb Chops with Lemon-Arugula Pesto, and Lamb Chops with Farro, Arugula, and Lemon-Thyme Vinaigrette for similar recipes.
